action.action-desc: Mr. Connolly introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Education to accept certain documentation from the Department of Defense as proof of employment for purposes of the public service loan forgiveness program.

section.header: Repayment plan for public service employees
section.text: Section 455(m) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087e) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Treatment of certain documentation from the Department of Defense
paragraph.text: In determining the eligibility of a borrower for loan forgiveness under this subsection, the Secretary of Education—

subparagraph.text: shall accept a DD Form 214 submitted by the borrower as proof of the borrower’s employment in the position indicated on such form during the time period indicated on such form; and
shall not require a borrower who submits a DD Form 214 to submit a separate employment certification form as proof of the borrower’s employment in such position during such time period.
